name: TicTacToe (Adams)
description:
A python .exe which allows you to play the famous game of TicTacToe.

I made this program while revising my python knowledge, so why not share it.

This is not a joke; it is just a TicTacToe game. Don't go looking for some deep lore.

2 GAME MODES:

Player vs Player

Player vs Computer (A braindead computer mind you!)
